channel.title: Getting MySQL to work with Apache and PHP
channel.description: Does anybody know how to get the newest version of MySQL to work with the newest version of apache and PHP. Any help would be appreciated, I am new to the whole thing. If it helps im hosting the site on my computer, and I am using no-ip dynamic update client for a web url. If anybody could tell me how to do this it would be great because I need to install smf 1.1.4[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 29, 2008, 03:35:19 PM[/size][hr]Never mind this can be locked. I have figured it out after looking through 5 (Verrrrryyy olllddd) guides.
